name: Breach() and Clear()
description:
Breach() and Clear() was created for the GMTKJam. You must manage your battery with your actions or risk a OS Reboot while in combat.  

[Press E to breach plaster walls] DON'T FORGET THIS

Controls: 

Left Mouse = Fire

Right Mouse = Taser

A = move Left

D = move Right

W = Look up

S = Look down

Space = Take cover (recharge battery)

E = breach plaster wall

R = Reload
